Package org.greports.annotations

Annotation Type SpecialRowCell

@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface SpecialRowCell

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    int columnWidth
    This value indicates the number of merged cells.
    java.lang.String comment
    A cell comment text.
    short commentHeight
    Default comment height in rows.
    short commentWidth
    Default comment width in columns.
    java.lang.String format
    Visualisation format to be applied.
    java.lang.String targetId
    A target id used to dynamically generate formulas.
    java.lang.String value
    Value of the cell with data to show
    ValueType valueType
    The ValueType of the column.

  • Element Details

    • targetId

      java.lang.String targetId
      A target id used to dynamically generate formulas. There cannot be 2 o more SpecialRowCells with empty targetId value.
      Returns:
      String
      Default:
      ""

    • valueType

      ValueType valueType
      The ValueType of the column.
      Returns:
      ValueType
      Default:
      PLAIN_VALUE

    • value

      java.lang.String value
      Value of the cell with data to show
      Returns:
      String
      Default:
      ""

    • format

      java.lang.String format
      Visualisation format to be applied. You can find information on how to create your own org.greports.styles by going through this link
      Returns:
      String
      Default:
      ""

    • comment

      java.lang.String comment
      A cell comment text.
      Returns:
      String
      Default:
      ""

    • commentWidth

      short commentWidth
      Default comment width in columns.
      Returns:
      short
      Default:
      2

    • commentHeight

      short commentHeight
      Default comment height in rows.
      Returns:
      short
      Default:
      2

    • columnWidth

      int columnWidth
      This value indicates the number of merged cells. A count of merged cells needs to be grater o equals than 1. If the value is greater than 1 means that the column will merge cells of his right. Example: position = 1 (first column), columnWidth = 2. In this case the row will have the cells A1 and B1 merged in only one cell which will be placed into A1 cell.
      Returns:
      int
      Default:
      1
